dialogues.speaker: SHIRRA
dialogues.text: We will talk of it tonight. Go quickly now. Lyle turns and walks quickly away. Shirra watches him for a moment, then hurries to a doorway set in the ancient wall and knocks, three slow knocks. The door opens and she walks into a courtyard. INSIDE, several young men and a few women, all in khaki, all armed, stand waiting. An elderly man lies on a rug in the sun. It is Professor Barnes.
